entities.description: How parents would feel about the respondent smoking one or more packs of cigarettes per day.
How parents would feel about the respondent trying marijuana or any cannabis product once or twice.
How parents would feel about the respondent using marijuana or any cannabis product once a month or more.
How parents would feel about the respondent having one or two drinks of an alcoholic beverage nearly every day.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's perception of how their parents feel about them smoking cigarettes.
Indicates the respondent's perception of how their parents feel about them trying marijuana or cannabis.
Indicates the respondent's perception of how their parents feel about them using marijuana or cannabis monthly.
Indicates the respondent's perception of how their parents feel about them drinking alcohol nearly every day.
